name: Paddle!Flap!Splat!
description:
Paddle! Flap! Splat! is a physics-based racing game about evolution and adaptation. Glide your character through an everchanging procedurally generated map, optimizing your bug for speed and survival while competing for upgrades with up to three other players in local multiplayer.

Local Multiplayer requires additional controllers or gamepads to be connected to the PC. Dualshock4 Controllers may require 3rd party software to be recognized.
